Tavatron howled in pain, but still kept focused. The force of Dinobot's blow 
threw her to the ground, her sword and staff laying somewhere in the 
surrounding shrubbery. Dinobot's blow to her face had disabled her optic 
lasers. Now weaponless, Tavatron staggered to her feet.

"Damn." Tavatron snarled through clenched teeth, mech-fluid flowing freely 
from her wounds. She crouched low to the ground, not bothering to try and 
stop the flow of mech-fluid.

Tavatron growled at Dinobot while her eyes searched the surrounding area for 
her lost weapons.

>From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
>Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
>Date: Sun, 16 Apr 2000 12:05:17 PDT
>
>* Dinobot snarled, the blow from Tavatron had momentarily taken him off
>balance but he then regained it quickly and stood at the ready.
>She had taken his advice and was now out of his reach, just as he had
>calculated.*
>
>" You...are more then what I first thought."
>
>* He looked at her with his one good optic and judged how far she was from
>him, it was then that he struck!!
>With quick speed Dinobot covered the distance between him and Tavatron in
>less then a blink of an optic and raised a clawed hand.
>He brought it down hard on Tavatron's torso again and slashed just above 
>the
>last wound, he then slammed his shoulder into Tavatron's cheek!*
>
